column1: # webanno.custom.Participants | Participant # webanno.custom.Events | Events # webanno.custom.Corefchains | Coref | AttachTo=webanno.custom.Participants
#text=Last week , I went to one of my favorite hairstylists after trying to get an appointment with her for over a month .
#text=She 's very in demand and it is hard to get an appointment with her .
#text=After finally getting one , I was very happy to be able to see her as my hair had gotten a bit too long for my tastes .
#text=When I got there , she started with a very gentle shampooing and scalp massage .
#text=She also gave me a beer to have while this was happening .
#text=Afterwards she did some aromatherapy and walked me back over to her chair where she cut my hair .
#text=She knows me well as I go to her fairly often when I feel like spending good money on a haircut , so it turned out great !
#text=Afterwards , I thanked her and made sure to leave her a nice tip for her good work .
